title: Kaytranada and Justice Announce Tour

html:
The electronic musicians will co-headline North American shows in the autumn

Kaytranada and Justice are going on tour together. The electronic musicians will co-headline North American shows in the autumn. See their arena tour schedule below.

Kaytranada and Justice shared a bill at a Paris show last year. The Canadian producer then remixed the French duo’s Hyperdrama song “Neverender.” Revisit that remix below.

Both Kaytranada’s Timeless and Justice’s Hyperdrama were nominated for Best Dance/Electronic Music Album at the 2025 Grammy Awards. Neither act won, however, as the trophy ultimately went to Charli XCX for Brat.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Kaytranada & Justice: Fall ’25 Tour

Kaytranada & Justice:

10-16 Vancouver, British Columbia - Rogers Arena
10-17 Seattle, WA - Climate Pledge Arena
10-19 Portland, OR - Moda Center
10-22 Oakland, CA - Oakland Arena
10-28 San Diego, CA - Viejas Arena
10-30 Phoenix, AZ - PHX Arena
11-01 Denver, CO - Ball Arena
11-05 Chicago, IL - United Center
11-08 Brooklyn, NY - Barclays Center
11-12 Atlanta, GA - State Farm Arena
11-15 Tampa, FL - Amalie Arena
11-16 Miami, FL - Kaseya Center

Matthew Strauss is a Long Island native and a graduate of Columbia University. He joined Pitchfork in 2013. ... Read More
